keyMoments.title: Fukaboshi Arrives at Mermaid Cove
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi, the eldest of the Neptune Brothers and first prince of Ryugu Kingdom, arrives at Mermaid Cove with his brothers to search for the Straw Hat Pirates and deliver a message from Jinbe.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Fukaboshi, who will become an important ally to the Straw Hats during the Fish-Man Island Arc.
keyMoments.quote: I have a question for you.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Mission from Jinbe
keyMoments.description: After the Straw Hats escape, Fukaboshi reveals that the Neptune Brothers were attempting to deliver a message from Jinbe to Luffy and his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up future plot developments and establishes Fukaboshi's connection to Jinbe and the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: We were attempting to pass on a message from Jinbe to the Straw Hat Pirates.

abilities.description: Skilled in Fish-Man Combat techniques as one of the Three Strongest of Neptune's Army.
Wields a trident as his main weapon, similar to his father Neptune.

relationships.description: Fukaboshi's younger brother and fellow prince of Ryugu Kingdom.

evolutionMoments.description: Fukaboshi arrives at Mermaid Cove with Ryuboshi and Manboshi.

relationships.description: Fukaboshi's youngest brother and fellow prince of Ryugu Kingdom.

evolutionMoments.description: Fukaboshi arrives at Mermaid Cove with Ryuboshi and Manboshi.

reveals.information: First Prince of Ryugu Kingdom and eldest of the Neptune Brothers
Has a message from Jinbe for the Straw Hat Pirates

keyMoments.title: Ryuboshi Arrives at Mermaid Cove
keyMoments.description: Ryuboshi, the second prince of Ryugu Kingdom, arrives at Mermaid Cove with his brothers Fukaboshi and Manboshi to search for the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Ryuboshi, one of the Three Strongest of Neptune's Army.

abilities.description: Skilled in Fish-Man Combat as one of the Three Strongest of Neptune's Army.

relationships.description: Ryuboshi's older brother and first prince of Ryugu Kingdom.

evolutionMoments.description: Ryuboshi arrives at Mermaid Cove with his brothers Fukaboshi and Manboshi.

relationships.description: Ryuboshi's younger brother and third prince of Ryugu Kingdom.

evolutionMoments.description: Ryuboshi arrives at Mermaid Cove with his brothers Fukaboshi and Manboshi.

reveals.information: Second Prince of Ryugu Kingdom and oarfish merman

keyMoments.title: Manboshi Arrives at Mermaid Cove
keyMoments.description: Manboshi, the youngest of the Neptune Brothers and third prince of Ryugu Kingdom, arrives at Mermaid Cove with his brothers to search for the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Manboshi, one of the Three Strongest of Neptune's Army.

abilities.description: Skilled in Fish-Man Combat as one of the Three Strongest of Neptune's Army.

relationships.description: Manboshi's oldest brother and first prince of Ryugu Kingdom.

evolutionMoments.description: Manboshi arrives at Mermaid Cove with his brothers Fukaboshi and Ryuboshi.

relationships.description: Manboshi's older brother and second prince of Ryugu Kingdom.

evolutionMoments.description: Manboshi arrives at Mermaid Cove with his brothers Fukaboshi and Ryuboshi.

reveals.information: Third Prince of Ryugu Kingdom and sunfish merman

keyMoments.title: Near-Fatal Nosebleed
keyMoments.description: Sanji suffers a massive, life-threatening nosebleed after being unable to contain his excitement around mermaids, particularly when pressed against Ishilly's chest. His blood loss is so severe that he requires an emergency transfusion.
keyMoments.significance: This moment reveals the dangerous consequences of Sanji's two-year isolation on Momoiro Island and becomes the catalyst for exposing the racial tensions on Fish-Man Island regarding blood donation.

reveals.information: Sanji's blood type is S RH-, an extremely rare blood type
Sanji's inability to control himself around women has reached life-threatening levels after two years on Momoiro Island

keyMoments.title: Reveals Blood Donation Prohibition
keyMoments.description: Hammond reveals to the Straw Hats that no one on Fish-Man Island would donate blood to humans, and that anyone who does will face 'judgment in the dark' from those who hate humans.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hammond as an antagonist and reveals the deep racial divide on Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.quote: No one on this island would give blood to lowly humans.

keyMoments.title: Tells of Fisher Tiger's Death
keyMoments.description: Hammond recounts the tragic story of Fisher Tiger's death, explaining how he died from blood loss because humans refused to donate blood to save his life, which led to the current prohibition.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial backstory that explains the Fish-Man Island Arc's central conflict regarding racism and discrimination.
keyMoments.quote: Fisher Tiger died bleeding after a battle and could have been easily saved with a transfusion, but no humans were willing to help him.

abilities.description: As a fish-man, Hammond possesses strength ten times that of an average human, and even greater underwater.
Hammond uses a rifle equipped with trawl nets to capture opponents.

reveals.information: Hammond is a daggertooth pike conger fish-man and member of the New Fish-Man Pirates
Reveals the blood donation prohibition and Fisher Tiger's death story
